title: Greek Chicken Pita
directions: Fill pita halves evenly with chicken, tomato, cucumber, onion (if desired), oregano, lemon juice, romaine, and cheese.
ingredients: 1 (6½-inch) whole wheat pita, cut in half to make pockets
3 oz cooked chicken breast, boneless, skinless, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 Tbsp. crumbled feta cheese (about ½ oz)
